structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: A certificate to serve as an inspector issued under KRS 198B.410 may be suspended or revoked by the department for the incompetence or untrustworthiness of the holder thereof, or for the falsification of any matter or statement contained in his or her application or in a report of any inspection.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 264, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 79. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 5.
